page.title: 10Societes
page.content: There are about 5 different clubs in Alsager.These are the Rotary,Round Table,B'hoys for men.For women there is the Inner circle and the Inner Wheel.They all try to raise money for local charities.They do this by holding social events such as bonfires,sports days,and luncheons etc.To join these clubs you need to be invited and you will only be accepted if you have a different occupation than the other members.To join you have to pay a membership fee.Which is around Â£35.The membership fee in the Rotary is split 3 ways some goes to charity,some to the president of the club to help world charities,the rest goes to the local section.The local Rotary club was formed in 1974.Each year a new president is elected. By C.Sankey,A.FARR,B.Boone,J.Hart.
